doc.after: A deicing boot is a type of ice protection system installed on aircraft surfaces to permit a mechanical deicing in flight Such boots are generally installed on the leading edges of wings and control surfaces e g horizontal and vertical stabilizer as these areas are most likely to accumulate ice and any contamination could severely affect the aircraft s performance
